subject: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Attn: Beneficiary,
 
This is to bring to your notice that all the abandoned consignments and
packages in the airport Sacramento international airport California, will
be confiscated by the US government on Saturday 24TH FEB. Your package
(Consignment Box) Valued $12,500,000.00 USD which was abandoned by the
delivery agent, you are advised to come to the airport to pick your
Package or send your delivery information,  so that it will be registered
with UPS or FedEx courier delivery.
 
Reconfirm the Below information accurate to avoid wrong delivery;
 
(1)Your Full Name=============
(2)Mobile Phone Number======
(3)Current Home Address========
(4)Fax Number================
(5)Country====================
(6)City======================
(7)Nearest Airport ==============
 
AIRPORT INFO;
Mr. Richard Silver
Airport Management
sacramentoi@usa.com
+1(916)400-0692
6900 Airport Blvd. Sacramento, CA, 95837.

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and informing me about the package at Sacramento airport. I must say, it's quite surprising to hear that a package valued at such a high amount has been abandoned. 

Could you please provide more details about this situation? How did my name get associated with this package? And why was it abandoned by the delivery agent in the first place?

I'm also curious about the process of registering the package with UPS or another courier service. Could you explain how that works?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Scott
